channel.title: Need help please!
channel.description:
Ok I have a problem in my server. When anyone drops an item, it drops, deletes from the inventory, but it does not appear on the ground to them or to other players. Please help, thank you!
edit: fixed dropping, now when I kill someone the loot doesn't show up.

item.title: Need help please!
item.dc:creator: @iz3_legend iz3 legend
item.description:
@iz3_legend wrote:

Check your drop item packet and look for any statements which could cause this problem.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help please!
item.dc:creator: @Skrillex_Craft Skrillex_Craft
item.description:
@Skrillex_Craft wrote:

its in your source search for allow drop then change it to true or something like that

something like this

public static final boolean ADMIN_CAN_TRADE = true; //can admins trade? public static final boolean ADMIN_CAN_SELL_ITEMS = true; // can admins sell items? public static final boolean ADMIN_DROP_ITEMS = true; // can admin drop items?

Read full topic

item.title: Need help please!
item.dc:creator: @ajw ajw
item.description:
@ajw wrote:

Skrillex_Craft:

means item on ground isnt on (also its anty transfer) it works only when u killed that person or duelled him in dueling arena hope this hhelped

hmm. kind of confusing how you worded it. Maybe a code please?

Read full topic
